alert.note: Alert for Custer (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued May 24 at 11:40AM MDT until further notice by NWS Pocatello
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Idaho... Big Lost River at Howell Ranch near Chilly affecting Custer County. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/pocatello. ...FLOOD WARNING FOR RAINFALL AND SNOWMELT REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Big Lost River at Howell Ranch near Chilly. * WHEN...Until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 4.1 feet, Widespread lowland flooding from Howell Ranch downriver to the top of Mackay Reservoir. Fish Hatchery Road near Donahue Ranch may have water flowing over it. Canals and headgates may have problems. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 11:00 AM MDT Wednesday the stage was 3.7 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 4.3 feet Sunday morning. It will then fall below flood stage Monday afternoon. - Flood stage is 4.1 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 4.3 feet on 06/24/2011. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Fld Observed Forecasts (12 pm MDT) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Thu Fri Sat Big Lost River Howell Ranch near Chill 4.1 3.7 Wed 11 am MD 3.9 4.1 4.2 &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas.
